3- 5 gallon batches
1) safale abbeye, 2 cps omega bit o funk, 3 swanson lacto p caps, 3 genesis probiotic caps... and after 1 week the dregs of flanders red
2) 3726 plus 2 cps omega bring da funk... then .5 gallons of fermenter 3 when racking into keg
3) 3726 plus 2 cups omega bring da funk and 1 cup bootleg biology pithos blend
